mapper.select: SELECT IDX, STEP, A_TYPE, SUPPLY_TYPE, A_LOCATION, PRICE, HOUSEHOLDS, BUILDING_AREA, CONSTRUCTION, DEVELOPER, MONOPOLY, A_RESTRICT, PRICE_UP, A_PERIOD, ANNOUCEMENT, MOVING_IN, A_IMAGE, A_IMAGES FROM SUB_DIVISION WHERE IDX = #{idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SUB_DIVISION (IDX, STEP, A_TYPE, SUPPLY_TYPE, A_LOCATION, PRICE, HOUSEHOLDS, BUILDING_AREA, CONSTRUCTION, DEVELOPER, MONOPOLY, A_RESTRICT, PRICE_UP, A_PERIOD, ANNOUCEMENT, MOVING_IN, A_IMAGE, A_IMAGES) VALUES (SUB_DIVISION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{step}, #{a_type}, #{supply_type}, #{a_location}, #{price}, #{households}, #{building_area}, #{construction}, #{developer}, #{monopoly}, #{a_restrict}, #{price_up}, #{a_period}, #{annoucement}, #{moving_in}, #{a_image}, #{a_images})
mapper.update: UPDATE SUB_DIVISION SET STEP = #{step}, A_TYPE = #{a_type}, SUPPLY_TYPE = #{supply_type}, A_LOCATION = #{a_location}, PRICE = #{price}, HOUSEHOLDS = #{households}, BUILDING_AREA = #{building_area}, CONSTRUCTION = #{construction}, DEVELOPER = #{developer}, MONOPOLY = #{monopoly}, A_RESTRICT = #{a_restrict}, PRICE_UP = #{price_up}, A_PERIOD = #{a_period}, ANNOUCEMENT = #{annoucement}, MOVING_IN = #{moving_in}, A_IMAGE = #{a_image}, A_IMAGES = #{a_images} WHERE IDX = #{idx}
